customer_reviews.title: Lots of volume, smells great, efficient product
customer_reviews.text: I have thin and long hair that weighs down easily and can look stringy, especially after a blow dry. This conditioner works really well and keeps my hair bouncy all day. I recommend for women that don't have a lot of strands but that are looking for smoothness and volume especially at the roots. I find that a lot of thinning-hair products tend to dry hair out and make it frizzier in order to create the much-needed volume. This keeps my hair so sleek. I haven't had a chance to use this for long duration, but so far so good. The price is a bit higher than most, but you don't need a lot and it really works!
customer_reviews.author: JKLA

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is the worst-- it makes your hair a tangled mess... terrible if your hair is already falling out. I bought this, the conditioner, and the spray and I don't like any of them and have noticed no difference. I find the product name ironic - because just trying to detangle your hair after use is doing the opposite of "sparing my hair".
customer_reviews.author: MoniqueRamsey

customer_reviews.title: This Spare my Hair conditioner is amazing. It smells heavenly
customer_reviews.text: This Spare my Hair conditioner is amazing. It smells heavenly, makes my hair smell amazing. It makes my hair so silky and smooth. I don't usually use conditioner because it makes my hair so greasy but this conditioner does not, it's the first one I've found that doesn't. I love that it's sulfate and parables free, we are exposed to enough chemicals on a daily basis who needs it in their conditioner, not me. I would reccomend to everyone!! I recieved this product at a discounted price in return for my honest review.
